Value.label: Watt Meter Report Period
Value.Help: The interval at which the device reports its instant power consumption to Group 1 nodes. Unit: 5 secs, Min: 1, Max: 32767, Default: 720 (= 1 hr)

Value.label: kWh Meter Report Period
Value.Help: The interval at which the device reports its accumulated energy consumption, in kWh, to all Group 1 nodes. Unit: 10 minutes, min: 1, max: 32767, default: 6 (= 1 hr)

Value.label: Threshold of current for Load Caution
Value.Help: When the current through the device exceeds this threshold, a current meter report will be sent to Group 1 nodes. min: 10, max: 1100, default: 1100 (= 11 A)

Value.label: Threshold of kWh for Load Caution
Value.Help: When the energy consumption through the device exceeds this threshold, a kWh report will be sent to Group 1 nodes. min: 1, max: 10000, default: 10000 kWh

Value.label: Restore switch state mode
Value.Help: After loss of power, device state will be set according to this parameter, default: Previous state.

Value.label: Mode of Switch Off function
Value.Help: When set to Disable, all commands to switch off the device are ignored, both via radio and the include button. default: Enable

Value.label: LED indication mode
Value.Help: Controls the light indicator in the device Switch State: When switch is on, LED is on. When switch is off, LED is off. (default) Night mode: When switch is on, LED is off. When switch is off, LED is on. One flash: When the device changes state, the LED illuminates for one second.

Value.label: Auto off timer
Value.Help: Controls the auto-off timer 0: The auto off timer is disabled (default) 1-32767: After switching on, the device will automatically switch off after this time

Value.label: RF off command mode
Value.Help: Controls how the device reacts to the SWITCH_ALL_OFF command Off: The device switches off (default) Ignore: The switch off command is ignored Toggle: It switches to the inverse of current state On: The device switches on
